Package gremlins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    App class: The main body of code extending PApplet, that integrates all of the individual object classes, and dictates how the game runs
    Destructable
    Destructable class: blocks that extend from immobile entities can be destroyed and deleted by the wizard's projectiles
    DrawMap
    DrawMap class: A helper class that reads the character ArrayList produced by the ReadMap class.
    Entity
    Base abstract Entity class.
    ExitPortal
    ExitPortal class: A block that extends from immobile entity that allows the player to progress to the next stage of the game.
    Fireball
    Fireball class: A projectile that extends from mobile entities - the wizard's main projectile
    FreezePotion
    FreezePotion class: An extension of the immobile entity that freezes all hostile entities.
    Gremlin
    Gremlin class: An extension of mobile entity that continuously moves, shoots, and respawns on a given map
    Immobile
    Abstract Immobile class of objects.
    Indestructable
    Indestructable class: blocks that extend from immobile entities that cannot be deleted or destroyed by any means
    JSONReader
    JSONReader class: a helper class that reads a JSON file.
    Kamehameha
    Kamehameha class: A special projectile class that clears out all destructable blocks in a row
    Mobile
    Mobile class: An abstract entity that has the ability to actively change their location
    Projectile
    Projectile class: An abstract class that extends from mobile entities The fireball and slimeball classes are extended from this class
    ReadMap
    ReadMap class: A helper class that reads the map specified in the config file
    RespawnGenerator
    RespawnGenerator class: a helper class that uses the Random library to generate a set of random coordinates That are at least a 10 block radius away from a specified entity.
    SlimeBall
    SlimeBall Class: The Slime's projectiles that extends a projectile (originates from mobile entity)
    UpdateArrayList<T>
    UpdateArrayList class: a generic helper class used to remove any null entries from an array given.
    Wizard
    Wizard class: The player controlled character that extends a mobile entity
